website_summaries.verdict: A good individual photo lens case that is small and convenient to carry around in a bag or backpack.
pros: Heavy-duty neoprene sizes provide an extra thick layer of protection around the sides and top/bottom of the lens
Small storage compartment on top is big enough for lens cap or accessories
Protects lenses from dust and rain
cons: Lens cases tend to run on the larger side, leaving space between the lens and walls

customer_reviews.title: I like it, its perfect to hold my 300mm canon ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it, its perfect to hold my 300mm canon lens, and my 24-105L, Its very secure to my belt and i have no fear of dropping my lenses. although the lens hood for the 24-105L is too large to fit in the pouch. without the lens hood its perfect. If it was just a little bit wider it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Dooley-Opper

customer_reviews.title: Solid built case with good padding
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case. it has very thick padding. I misread the interior demensions. It won't even come close to fitting the Tamron 70-200 f 2.8 lens I had purchased it for. I will have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: A nice solid case!
customer_reviews.text: I keep a 500mm Mirror lens in and it fits perfectly!. I like having options for using the straps and other methods of connecting the case to other equipment. A nice solid case!
customer_reviews.author: LaVell Finerson

customer_reviews.title: Travels and protects Sony alpha a6000 55-210mm lens well with extra space
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to store my Sony alpha a6000 55-210mm lens and it stores it well, protects it well, and is small enough where you can easily travel with it in a backpack or a travel bag. The bag itself for only the 55-210mm lens is a bit large as there is extra room even with the tie completely tight. If you are looking for something to store the 55-210mm lens snuggly, you may want to consider a smaller pouch bag. I can comfortably fit the 55-210mm lens with an extra battery with extra space.
customer_reviews.author: katespadecase

customer_reviews.title: Protection Overload
customer_reviews.text: Yup, got more than I bargained for. This will definitely keep my lens protected. Well constructed and padded. Lots of options to carry via belt, clip and strap. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.text: I tried to use this with my Rokinon 35 mm... A waste of money and time. Don't get me wrong. This is a good case but the interior won't wrap enough my lens. I had to put an extra pad for that.
customer_reviews.author: laz guerra

customer_reviews.title: Great Lens Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good lens bag. It's padded which makes it durable. My Tamron 18-400 and my Nikon 70 - 300 fit in this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Clever bag. Fits a variety of lens sizes. Offers good protection. Worth getting.
customer_reviews.author: D. M.

customer_reviews.title: but it’s sturdy and nicely constructed
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this didn’t fit the lens I wanted it for, but it’s sturdy and nicely constructed.
customer_reviews.author: melinda

customer_reviews.title: Nice protective lens case.
customer_reviews.text: High quality, sturdy protection for lenses plus filters etc. Handles 77+ MM lens. Thick padding all around with multiple attachment points and shoulder strap. Small pocket inside top plus included case with lens wipes. Nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Craig A.

customer_reviews.title: Very soft inside and I like that it has a draw string on top for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is very large camera bag, more for a large long lens. Very soft inside and I like that it has a draw string on top for easy closing.
customer_reviews.author: hla arabian

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: Nice lens case but too big for my lens. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an option that could be used for different size lenses when traveling without a camera bag. This worked great protecting my 2nd lens with just putting this in my normal backpack while traveling around Ireland. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda J Krauss

customer_reviews.title: and the padding is good enough that I could throw it and it probably ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use for a trumpet mute. It fits every kind of mute, and the padding is good enough that I could throw it and it probably wouldn’t do any damage to a mute.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lens pouch.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to store one of my most prized lenses and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Harry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An excellent Pouch Bag for my lens and recommend this great product, H
customer_reviews.author: HF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for my lens. Fast delivery - I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard from L.A.

customer_reviews.title: An excellent case for cinematic lenses.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My cinematic lens fits perfectly even with the lens hood.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent W. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Well made and worked great. It doesn't hold all my lenses which was ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made and worked great. It doesn't hold all my lenses which was kind of a bust but overall great if you are using for smaller lenses
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stitched weird and inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I have more than one, and they don't all look the same. I guess it works, sort of, but I could probably fill a five cent plastic bag with a pile of tissues and put my lens in there to get equal protection.
customer_reviews.author: Biggie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doing a very fine job protecting my new, and very expensive, zoom lens!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bob D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As promised fits a bulky lens like my Sony G 100-400 nearly without the extended tripod mount affixed perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Carol P

customer_reviews.title: I got 3 and they are all breaking after a couple months
customer_reviews.text: Got 3 for my lenses a couple months ago, two have zippers failing and the other has seams coming apart. Not very well constructed, should have lasted a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Good, but big
customer_reviews.text: Like others.... nice quality case, but way too big for my Canon 75-300 lens. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Miss-sewn
customer_reviews.text: About half way down it's sewn crooked. The only thing that would fit in here is a lens shaped like a cone.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: Way too large for a tele. Unfortunately there were no measurements provided in the ad.
customer_reviews.author: biker3h

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit modern zoom lenses, good fit for two primes
customer_reviews.text: I have the Tamron 70-200 G2 and it sticks out about an inch.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: five star
customer_reviews.text: Really nice for money. Well lined and look to be constructed well. The smallest is really small, not sure what lens would fit in it. So in reality, it is more like your getting a three pack
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Robilotta

product_meta.title: ESDDI Photo Large Neoprene Pouch Bag for DSLR Camera Lens (Canon, Nikon, Pentax, Sony, Olympus, Panasonic)
product_meta.description:
Size:L lens case
Size: Large

Why do we choose ESDDI?

ESDDI specializes in manufacturing photographic equipment like lighting kit, camera tripods, lighting mounts and other accessories. We are committed to establishing a brand focusing on higher quality, excellent service for customers.

ESDDI super soft flannelette lens pouch are great protective cases to have to shield your lenses from all sorts of harm and damage. Being soft, yet durable, this pouch is ideal for containing and protecting your lenses of all sizes.

Contains: 1 x large lens pouch 

Very soft and durable to hold and protect your camera lens.

Its unique cylindrical design, give your lens the perfect protection. 

Compatible with lenses from Canon, Nikon, Olympus, Fuji, Pentax, Panasonic, Sony, Leica, Sigma, Tamron, Vivitar, Minolta, Mamiya, Yashica, Kodak, Konica, Hasselblad, Ricoh, Zeiss & Lensbaby etc.

Note: Do not let this pouch come in contact with: acetone, iodine, hydrogen peroxide, kerosene, bleach, or motor oil. These may cause the neoprene material to decay.

Specifications:

Large: 4.33(110mm) " X7.48(190mm)".

Resistant to degradation.

Extreme weather resistant.

Soft & Pliable.

Lightweight and easily stored.
feature_bullets: 【DURABILITY】ESDDI lens pouch are made of neoprene, are very soft and elastic, but durable to hold and protect your lens, with belt loops & quick clips easy to carry and place,great lens case for photographer
【FUNCTIONS】water-proof dslr camera bag; with thick blue soft plush protecting lens against harsh weather, accidental bumps, and scratches, well suited to shutterbugs who love traveling
【DIMENSIONS】 large: 4.33(110mm) " X7.48(190mm); widely use, perfect lens case protect your lens from shock, bump, dirt, etc
【WIDELY USED】 lens pouch compatible with lenses from most popular cameras, including Canon, Panasonic, Pentax, Olympus, Nikon, Fuji, and many other popular brands
【NOTE】large lens bag only, lens not included in package;Backed with ESDDI 90-Day 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
